00073f20.name: Fear
00073f20.text: Creatures and people flee for 30 seconds

0003eb24.text: Alteration spells last longer for 60 seconds

0003eb23.name: Fortify Barter
0003eb23.text: You haggle for better prices for 30 seconds

0003eb1c.name: Fortify Block
0003eb1c.text: Blocking absorbs more damage for 60 seconds

0003eb25.name: Fortify Conjuration

0003eb26.name: Fortify Destruction
0003eb26.text: Destruction spells deal more damage for 60 seconds

0003eb29.name: Fortify Enchanting
0003eb29.text: For 30 seconds items are enchanted stronger

0003eb1e.name: Fortify Heavy Armor
0003eb1e.text: Increase Heavy Armor skill for 60 seconds

0003eb27.name: Fortify Illusion

0003eb1f.name: Fortify Light Armor
0003eb1f.text: Increases Light Armor skill for 60 seconds

0003eb1b.name: Fortify Marksman
0003eb1b.text: Bows do more damage for 60 seconds

0003eb19.name: Fortify One Handed
0003eb19.text: One-handed weapons do more damage for 60 seconds

0003eb28.name: Fortify Restoration
0003eb28.text: Restoration spells are stronger for 60 seconds

0003eb1d.name: Fortify Smithing
0003eb1d.text: For 30 seconds weapon and armor improving is better

0003eb22.name: Fortify Sneak
0003eb22.text: You are harder to detect for 60 seconds

0003eb1a.name: Fortify Two Handed
0003eb1a.text: Two-handed weapons do more damage for 60 seconds

00073f29.name: Frenzy
00073f29.text: Creatures and people will attack anything nearby for 10 seconds

0010de5f.text: Drains the target's Magicka for 10 seconds
